participant_1.name: Jade
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Jade often finds joy in quiet activities like bird watching. She is passionate about animal rights and has a colorful style that reflects her vibrant personality.
participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. i am an animal activist. my age is too old to say. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and social, Ryan enjoys connecting with others at the gym and has a keen interest in cars. He balances work and leisure with a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.
